messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] reading ideas
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/14/2000 1:51:17 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... often ... daily ... LOL  How do you think I learned to suggest it?  I m finally getting into
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/14/2000 1:51:17 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
MorelFam@... writes:

> eiraul-- ty for the suggestions. this one is intriguing, i especially like
> the part about saving the tape as PROOF and reminder of progress! so
often
> we are looking forward to what is still UN-done, or not-good-enough yet,
> instead of looking back to how FAR we have come! i am guilty of this
daily
> in many areas. glad for the reminder myself...
> erin

LOL How do you think I learned to suggest it? I'm finally getting into my
consciousness to check progress as well as the goal. Took almost 40 years
and I'm looking forward to about that many more to keep working on it.

Eiraul
